list_definition.definition: a close and careful study to find out (new) facts or information

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: He is engaged in cancer research
His researches resulted in some amazing discoveries

list_definition.definition: to carry out such a study

list_ex_of_english: Given the nature of our research questions, we needed to target organic shoppers.
Research into semantic skills focuses less on the qualitative aspects of linguistic competence than does research into phonological and morphosyntactic skills.
His research aims at understanding consciousness as a natural biological phenomenon and at fruitful interaction between philosophical and empirical research in the study of consciousness.
With a background in philosophical logic and metaphysics, his current research interests focus on the theoretical basis of bioethical inquiry.
Without a better understanding of popular terminology and establishment of clear philosophical goals, it will be impossible to design and conduct relevant crop/livestock research.
Future research needs to consider the role of fathers or male caregivers in the emotional development of physically maltreated children.
Research should also examine the way that child gender may influence the development and use of emotion regulation strategies in physically maltreated children.
It is theory tested by many individual research findings that permits the generation of predictions about program outcomes under different conditions.
